Description.Text: The Hotel Internazionale is about 40 km away from Stresa and is set in a strategic position to discover the beauties of the Lake Maggiore area. The hotel is 15 minutes` walk from Domodossola Train Station from where it`s possible to reach Stresa in only 30 minutes and Milan in about 1 hour. This family ran property features 28 comfortable and colourful rooms equipped with all modern facilities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TV, minibar and free Wi-Fi connection. Some room has hydro massage shower. A continental breakfast including hot drinks and croissants is served in the room daily and guests can dine at the hotel restaurant and taste typical Italian specialties.
